metadata.name: Splat #1
metadata.description:
This is the very first NFT I've ever minted. I decided to start with a series of paint splatter images, since I've been a traditional artist for many years, and constantly have paint everywhere.

This girl was generated with AI, and then painted and corrected in Photoshop. She has the most beautiful blue eyes, and a tiny Mona Lisa smile. 

As is true with all my work, this piece is bold and colorful. I have always been completely unafraid of color, and am happiest when working on pieces filled with it.
